title: Assassins.Creed.IV.Black.Flag.Freedom.Cry-RELOADED
description:
Assassin's Creed IV Black Flag Freedom Cry Addon DLC (c) Ubisoft 
         12/2013 :..... RELEASE.DATE .. PROTECTION .......: Steam+UbiDRM+DLC 
               1 :.......... DISC(S) .. GAME.TYPE ........: Action, Adventure 
        
   Note: 
   ~~~~~ 
   This release is an addon for Assassins.Creed.IV.Black.Flag-RELOADED. 
   It will add the Freedom Cry addon DLC. It will also update your game to 
   v1.04. No previous update is required to apply this addon. 
   -- 
   Born a slave, Adewale found freedom as a pirate aboard the Jackdaw as 
   Captain Edward Kenway's second-in-command. Fifteen years later, Adewale has 
   become a trained assassin and finds himself shipwrecked in Saint-Domingue 
   with no weapon nor crew, starting a new adventure of his own. 
   
   1. Unrar. 
   2. Burn or mount the image. 
   3. Install the addon to where you installed the game. 
   4. Copy over the cracked content from the /Crack directory on the image to 
      your game install directory. 
   5. Play the game. 
   6. Support the software developers. If you like this game, BUY IT!
